description: Split a generic UNION ALL CTE into specialized CTEs when the main query filters by year or discriminator - eliminates redundant scans
Convert INTERSECT subquery pattern to multiple EXISTS clauses for better join planning
Extract shared dimension filters (date, item, promotion) into CTEs when multiple channel CTEs (store/catalog/web) apply identical filters independently
Pre-filter multiple dimension tables (date + store) into separate CTEs before joining with fact table
When multiple CTEs each perform GROUP BY + WINDOW (cumulative sum), then are joined with FULL OUTER JOIN followed by another WINDOW pass for NULL carry-forward: defer the WINDOW out of the CTEs, join
